Attribute.Name: Backlog
Attribute.Description: Indicates if a demand is a a backlog

Attribute.Name: DemandDate
Attribute.Description: Date for which demand is being summarized.

Attribute.Name: NoOfWorkingDays
Attribute.Description: Number of Working Days required by the Resource Pool to fulfill the demand which is obtained by grouping ResourcePool, DemandDate and the GroupByAttribute.

Attribute.Name: NoOfWorkingHours
Attribute.Description: Number of Working Hours required by the Resource Pool to fulfill the demand which is obtained by grouping ResourcePool, DemandDate and the GroupByAttribute.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Name of the Attribute by which output is grouped. For example RequestedShipmentDate of Shipment.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the Attribute by which output is grouped.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Name of the Attribute by which output is grouped. For example RequestedShipmentDate of Shipment.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the Attribute by which output is grouped.
